attributes.action: Add rabbits to the Pet Travel Scheme
attributes.additional_details:
To add Rabbits to the Pet Travel Scheme (PETS), in a similar fashion to that for dogs, cats and ferrets.
With alteration instead of Rabies vaccination, as mimial to zero risk of rabbits carrying the disease, to VHD and Myxomatosis vaccinations.
In all other regards for requirements for admission to the UK, to be treated the same as cats, ferrets and dogs.
Information on the current system and rules can be found at; http://www.defra.gov.uk/wildlife-pets/pets/travel/ with the Pet Travel Scheme information available from the left hand menu.
